Uses of Package
actr.model

Packages that use actr.model
actr.model   
actr.task   
 

Classes in actr.model used by actr.model
Audio
          The audio module representing ACT-R's auditory perception.
Bold
          Prediction of BOLD response that arises from buffer activity.
Buffers
          Maintains the state of the ACT-R buffers.
Chunk
          Chunks of declarative knowledge represented as pairings of slots and slot values.
Declarative
          Declarative memory that holds chunks of declarative knowledge.
Event
          The abstract class for a model event.
Events
          A queue of upcoming events sorted by time.
ExtendedMemory
          External declarative memory that can be used to supplement the Java standard memory implementation (e.g., an external database).
Imaginal
          The imaginal module that holds a temporary problem state for the current task.
Instantiation
          An instantiation of a production rule specified as a mapping from variables to values.
Model
          The highest-level class representing an ACT-R model.
Module
          Abstract class for an ACT-R module.
Motor
          The motor module representing ACT-R's manual movements.
ParseError
           
Procedural
          Procedural memory that holds skill knowledge represented as production rules.
Production
          Condition-action production rules that serve as the primary representation of cognitive skill.
Speech
          The speech module representing ACT-R's vocal speech generation.
Symbol
          A symbol within the system, roughly represented as a string but allowing "==" as a fast test for equality.
Temporal
          The temporal module representing ACT-R's perception of time.
Vision
          The vision module representing ACT-R's visual perception.
 

Classes in actr.model used by actr.task
Event
          The abstract class for a model event.
Model
          The highest-level class representing an ACT-R model.
